title: Google\Cloud\Debugger\BreakpointStorage\SysvBreakpointStorage
name: SysvBreakpointStorage
description: This implementation of BreakpointStorageInterface using PHP's shared memory provided by the Semaphore Functions.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Prepare the key for semaphore and shared memory.

exceptions.description: when failed to attach to the shared memory.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Load debugger breakpoints from the storage. Returns a 2-arity array with the debuggee id and the list of breakpoints.

exceptions.description: when failed to attach to the shared memory.
